intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Rutam is a developer interested in building AI-driven applications and scalable web solutions. His work spans fullstack development, interactive applications, and open-source contributions.

Nordstone.achievements: Developed a high-performance e-commerce platform, resulting in improved customer engagement and increased conversion rates.;Created an AI-powered chatbot using LangChain, enhancing user interaction.
